author: Will Howson
description: The choice and generosity of dash of chocolate bitters is key to the success of this boozy after dinner cocktail. Nail this and the chocolate amplifies fig and raison notes.
name: Harry Dean Stanton
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
